div.p: The Procedure and ProcedureNotDone profiles represent the positive and negative statements for a procedure.
The following example illustrates the use of the ProcedureNotDone profile:

pre.code: define "No VTE Prophylaxis Device Applied": [ ProcedureNotDone : "Device Application"] DeviceNotApplied where (DeviceNotApplied.usedCode in "Intermittent pneumatic compression devices (IPC)" or DeviceNotApplied.usedCode in "Venous foot pumps (VFP)" or DeviceNotApplied.usedCode in "Graduated compression stockings (GCS)" ) return { id: DeviceNotApplied.id, requestStatusReason: DeviceNotApplied.statusReason, authoredOn: DeviceNotApplied.recorded() }

tr.td: See the patterns page for implementation and usage patterns.
Procedure not performed due to complications; indicates that none of the procedures in the given not done value set were performed.
Procedure not performed due to complications; indicates that a specific procedure, by code, was not performed.

div.p: For a more complete discussion of representation of negation within QICore and quality improvement artifacts, see the Negation in QI Core topic.
